tool_description: Access the most comprehensive dietary, health, and sustainability dataset on food & beverage products in the U.S. The GreenChoice Empower Food API gives you access to high-quality food & beverage product details (product types, ingredients, nutrition facts), over 100 regulatory-compliant derived dietary, wellness, and values attributes tags, evidence-based nutrition ratings and sustainability ratings, climate labels with carbon footprint and water footprint estimates, and healthy alternatives...
name: Food - Diet - Nutrition - Sustainability
title: Food - Diet - Nutrition - Sustainability

api_list.name: betterHealth
api_list.description:
Retrieve up to 12 products with score details and minimal product attributes.
You must send us your catalog to receive recommendations within your catalog. Please see Submitting Your Catalog for more details on sending us your catalog.

required_parameters.name: upc
required_parameters.description: The UPC (GTIN in UPC12 format) for the product

api_list.description: Retrieve a single product's Carbon Footprint Estimate, Carbon Footpint Value Tag, Carbon Equivalent, Water Footprint Estimate, Water Footprint Value Tag, & Water Equivalent

required_parameters.name: upc
required_parameters.description: The UPC (GTIN in UPC12 format) for the product

api_list.name: matchEnriched
api_list.description: Retrieve a single product's information, including attributes, insights, and scores.

required_parameters.name: upc
required_parameters.description: The UPC (GTIN in UPC12 format) for the product

api_list.name: matchDownload
api_list.description:
1. Download the updated product file
Retrieve your product file with new columns "Matched", "Eligible", and "Match Details".
2. Review the file for data issues
If the column Matched is "Y" and the column Eligible is "Y", GreenChoice has the data to enrich that product.
4. Request Raw Data Collection
You may also request GreenChoice to perform Raw Data Collection on any UPCs you wish.
Schedule a meeting or email us for more details.
Note: Sending us your reliable data to enable enrichment is faster and more affordable than Raw Data Collection.
Please see Submitting Your Catalog for more details on sending us your catalog.

required_parameters.name: fileName
required_parameters.description: The name of the file as given in the /match/check output or the email notification
